blog.name: lotsoffandomimagines
blog.title: ✎ Just Imagine It ✎
blog.description:
☆ masterlist → rules → fandom list → about → fav imagines ☆
Hi! The name’s Ace. My blog runs on requests so send them in, but read my rules and fandom list before doing so! Gifs aren't mine. OC information is in my “about” link. Last but not least, this is a safe space for everyone! Be nice to each other and let your imagination soar.

summary:
Requested by anonymous 
You and Sansa were arranged to be eventually married but, reasonably so, she was wary around you. Most...
body:
Requested by anonymous

You and Sansa were arranged to be eventually married but, reasonably so, she was wary around you. Most of the people in her life she married or betrothed to treated her terribly. You had absolutely no intentions to do anything of the sort but it became quite apparent to you that Sansa wasn’t going to just take your word for it. You wanted to prove yourself to her but the only question you had was how you were going to do that.

Soon enough you deduced that the best way to do this was to turn to someone close to Sansa for assistance. Who better than her sister Arya. Ever since you and Sansa became engaged to one another you and Arya became pretty good friends. You had no doubt that Arya would not only just be able to help you but that she’d also be more than willing to do so. “What do you think I should do?” You asked Arya after the two you had finished sparing with swords.

“Sansa’s been through a lot. She’s not going to trust you just like that” replied Arya, snapping her fingers to further her point. “You’re going to have to prove yourself to her. Prove that you’re worthy of marrying her. Show her how kind and intelligent you are. It won’t happen right away but I think if you keep on showing her the real you, she’ll begin to trust you”.

You were going to say something in return to this but as you did Sansa appeared. Seeing her sister Arya encouraged you to put your plan into action. Breathing in sharply you ultimately agreed. “Alright, fine, be myself. Prove myself… how hard could that be?”.

REQUESTS ARE OPEN

blog.name: alrightsnaps
blog.title: darling, dearest, dead
blog.description:
«It is probable that falling in love was the most important thing that they ever accomplished, and they accomplished a number of quite important things..»
Marauders Era + TLAT trash. 
Daenerys Targaryen and House Martell loyalist. Bellamy Blake and Raven Reyes.
His Dark Materials. 
Period drama and high fantasy enthusiast.

summary: Arya stood there as beautiful as ever. She looked incredible. The sleeves of her shirt had been pushed up above her elbows, with...
body:
Arya stood there as beautiful as ever. She looked incredible. The sleeves of her shirt had been pushed up above her elbows, with sweat darkening the pale fabric and binding it to Arya’s muscles, a result Daenerys didn’t object to in the least. She lowered her hand from her mouth, aware she was grinning like a fool. “What are you doing here?” she asked when she finally got her mouth working again.

“Heard the Queen was coming for a visit and wanted to see her for myself.”

She couldn’t help it, she wanted to play along with Arya’s game. “Did she live up to your expectations?”

Slowly grey eyes dropped from her face, past her neck to her body. Arya’s gaze cut right through her, taking in every part of her before returning to where she started. “She’s full of surprises,” Arya said in a smooth, seductive voice.

“Is that so?” Daenerys challenged, after a chuckle.

Right on time to ruin the moment Jorah arrived with the Septa. She smiled at Daenerys and Arya in turn. “Ah, your Grace, I see you met our hardest working volunteer.”

She appraised Arya with new eyes, raising an eyebrow in silent question. Now that she was looking for it, she could see that she had a darker tan than at the tourney. “I have,” she confirmed.

“She arrived on the day we began building saying she wished to help and hasn’t missed a day since.”

Arya shrugged. “Just doing my part to help fulfill the Queen’s plans for the Realm.”

Daenerys was touched. While she’d been worrying about whether or not Arya would reach out to her, she’d been helping to complete the orphanage Daenerys wanted in her city. While she thought about Arya’s sweetness Daenerys became aware that everyone was looking to her to say something. “I’m sorry,” Daenerys said as her eyes flicked from face to face. “I was lost in thought a moment.”

Arya’s smirk reminded her of the first time she saw it, when she was sitting on the floor of the tavern, awaiting the snakes.

—Just Dany

This story is basically my idiot girls getting up to noble and kind-hearted shit to get the other’s attention and praise, and managing to make them horny as fuck.

And, frankly, I can’t argue with that method of seduction.

blog.title: darling, dearest, dead
blog.description:
«It is probable that falling in love was the most important thing that they ever accomplished, and they accomplished a number of quite important things..»
Marauders Era + TLAT trash. 
Daenerys Targaryen and House Martell loyalist. Bellamy Blake and Raven Reyes.
His Dark Materials. 
Period drama and high fantasy enthusiast.

summary: Over time, and quite unintentionally Dany’s goodness spread to Arya. The darkness that polluted every corner of her life was...
body:
Over time, and quite unintentionally Dany’s goodness spread to Arya. The darkness that polluted every corner of her life was just a little bit brighter with Dany there. The effects were noticeable. In Dany’s company she laughed and smiled more than she had since she was a child. Her dreams were further evidence. How many times had she murdered Joffrey in the privacy of her mind? When Dany was with her, she dreamt of Dragons, Queens and Wolves, both living and dead, she dreamt of her family. When she woke with Dany pressed against her naked body, her revenge and her hate weren’t the first things that crossed her mind. In those moments she allowed herself to think that maybe there could be a future for her that wasn’t dominated by death.

Even now, aware that she would never get the chance to feel that goodness again, the hope remained. She knew what Dany thought of herself. She thought she was evil, the product of poisoned blood and madness. Every outburst reinforced Dany’s poor self esteem, leading her to believe it was only a matter of time until she ended up like her father. Arya knew better. She’d seen evil, she’d experienced it and she knew that Dany wasn’t. She had a temper sure, and she could react violently when she felt frustrated or threatened but that was a long walk from evil. She had wanted to be there when Dany realized she was nothing like the Targaryens who came before…

— Just Dany or In Which Both My Girls Think They’re Monsters And The Other Is The Sun And They Find Peace And Healing Together

blog.name: crying-over-spilled-feels
blog.title: Crying Over Spilled Feels (A Fanfiction Blog)
blog.description: FanFiction Imagine, Request, Headcanon, and Review Blog for countless fandoms. I will also do series/movie reviews as well as song recommendations and writing prompts. She/Her pronouns. Female. Age:19

tags: not a request but I had the idea while watching an episode
and because Jon and Arya are two of my favorite characters
best friends and partners in crime
summary: When the Student Surpasses Her Master
title: When the Student Surpasses Her Master
body:
Disclaimer: I do not own any of the canon characters; they belong to George R.R. Martin and HBO. This is most likely an AU fic, as I’ve just begun watching Game of Thrones for the first time, so I’m only on Season Two. No spoilers, please! Also, when I refer to ‘adulthood’, I mean around 16 or so since that was typically when most young women were married at the time. 

 

           After what seems like decades spent away from his family, Jon Snow returns home for a brief visit to Winterfell. In actuality, the illegitimate son of Lord Eddard Stark had only been away a maximum of three years. However, in that time, so much has changed the landscape he was lucky enough to call ‘home’ in his youth. For one, Robb has become the King in the North after the war against the Lannisters, bringing great honor and pride to the Stark family and the whole of Winterfell. Sansa, Arya, and Bran have all made it safely into adulthood with Rickon not far from joining them. It seemed to be entirely true that the Starks are hard to kill, as Jon told Robb before leaving for the Wall. Breathing in the scents of home, Jon strides into the castle’s courtyard with Ghost obediently trotting alongside his master.

           Due to his distraction at seeing home again, Jon barely sees the point of a blade aimed at his muscular chest.

“Hello, Jon,” Arya smiles, gently tapping Needle against her half-brother’s chest. “Did you miss me?” she inquires, standing side-face as Jon pulls out his own blade.

“Of course I did, Arya,” Jon grins, striking his sword against Arya’s and relishing in the large metallic clang it produces. “I see your skill has improved remarkably, my sister,” he compliments before smirking. “But, you’re still not skilled enough to best me, I’m afraid,” the young man laughs as he teases Arya.

The youngest Stark daughter quickly disarms her older, stronger brother.

“How in the Seven Kingdoms did you do that?!”

“Perhaps I just like proving you wrong,” Arya cheekily grins. “I do believe the student has surpassed the master, Jon,” she laughs, earning her a light shove.

Author’s Note: Okay, so I had never watched Game of Thrones before this year because I was not old enough to watch such a mature show, but I bought all completed seven seasons and recorded Season Eight to watch as a present to myself for my 19th birthday in May. I am only on Episode 7 of Season Two, so please do not give me any spoilers as to how the show actually ends. I will watch more episodes whenever I get the chance, but right now I’m having to work around 43 hours outside in the heat all day because about two of my co-workers quit and two others are on vacation for a few days. Expect more Game of Thrones fics from me both here and on my FanFiction account, which you can find by searching ‘Outsiders Obsessor FanFiction’  on Google if you’re interested. If you have any non-spoiler requests, please let me know! Reviews, as always, are greatly appreciated as long as they contain no spoilers. Until next time, dear readers! Have an amazing day, afternoon, or night!

summary: Arya doesn’t make prefect for Gryffindor bc she’s too much of a wild child unlike Gendry who is a prefect for Hufflepuff....
body: Arya doesn’t make prefect for Gryffindor bc she’s too much of a wild child unlike Gendry who is a prefect for Hufflepuff. However, Arya is Head Girl for her year as Gendry’s counterpart because who else works as hard as the good sis Arya?

blog.description: Wassup! I'm the Awesome Erin. This blog has stuff that grabs my attention, makes me think, gives me the giggles, or pisses me off. Take a guess as to which is what. I post about many things.

summary: Ok...
body:
Ok…

Y’all remember this post and the response it got?

Well I have started it but I can figure out which way I want to start it. I’ve written pretty much 4 different opening chapters.

  1. Ned meets Gendry and we go from there
  2. Gendry goes to Ned AFTER Ned meets him
  3. Ned takes Gendry to Winterfell and explains stuff to Catelyn (who is less than pleased)
  4. A timeline where Gendry has been at Winterfell for a while and Ned brings Robert n nem back to Winterfell because he was smart and played the long game. There will be flashbacks occasionally to how Gendry’s time went in Winterfell and how Gendrya came to be in later chapters

So which one should I choose? I’m also taking other options as well.

tags: what do you know of my heart priestess?
summary:
Alys is not Arya
The heart is all that matters-
What do you know of my heart priestess? What do you know of my sister? 
You owe...
body:
Alys is not Arya

The heart is all that matters-

What do you know of my heart priestess? What do you know of my sister?

You owe me this one little girl

Bring her home

I want my bride back

I want my bride back.

Tell me Jon Snow doesn’t love Arya the most. Tell me Jon Snow is going to leave Arya to go off and marry Dany/Sansa after he only just got her back. Tell me Jon Snow is going to sacrifice Arya like Nissa Nissa. The Jon Snow GRRM gives us would let the world burn before sticking a sword through her heart.

Tell me Jon Snow is going to sacrifice Arya like Nissa Nissa. The Jon Snow GRRM gives us would let the world burn before sticking a sword through her heart.
